metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8414 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ConfBridge in Asterisk 11.x before 11.14.1 and Certified Asterisk 11.6 before 11.6-cert8 does not properly handle state changes, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (channel hang and memory consumption) by causing transitions to be delayed, which triggers a state change from hung up to waiting for media.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
